website_summaries.verdict: It's hard to find another sports bra with the same amount of comfort and support in this price range, making this product the best bang for your buck.
pros: A top choice for its mesh camisole design, which offers plenty of security along with generous breathability
cons: A handful of consumers complain that the material, especially the strap, can be a bit scratchy and rough before the first few washes

customer_reviews.title: AT LAST!!
customer_reviews.text: My search for a sports bra is finally over!! No longer do I have to stuff myself into three sports bras, crushing my bosom and my soul, to be able to get a good workout. My 36G bust is fully supported in this bra - it's comfortable, easy to put on, and cute! I especially like the panel that prevents too much cleavage, which has always been a problem for me. Now I can go to the gym without feeling self conscious. I'll definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: BUY. THIS. BRA!!! Especially if you have large breast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am every bit of a 40G in my bra size. So I ordered the same size in this sports bra. I kid you not, the is the most AMAZING bra I have ever put on my body- hands down. I jumped several times and they were sooo supported and restricted, but I am so comfortable. It is a lil too small in the cup. So I will be ordering lots more in a slightly larger cup size. The band fits perfectly. I love it! I love it so much I almost cried. I've been looking for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MIA HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Over the shoulder boulder holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra. Unfortunately there is no give what-so-ever. Its constricting and tight. I usually wear a 40DDD so I read the reviews and purchased a 38F. I had to return it and Amazon made it really easy for me to do the return btw, but I will have to buy 2 sizes up. When I had it on I did a jumping Jack and they stayed in place for the most part. Better than any other sports bra I've ever come across when dealing with larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: @koastedco

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, I've tried on so many sports bras and repeatedly struck out. This one gets the gold star for me! I'm an odd size, 32 DD so finding a snug fit with support is very tricky for me. This one doesn't come in my size so I just went up to my sister size, 34 D and it fits great. For not having an underwire I get such nice perky lift! And who's complaining about having pokey pointy boobs?? That's PERK girls and frankly I like a little shape when I'm wearing a sports bra don't you? And for not having an underwire this little guy packs a punch. Good coverage, good support, good going glamorise : )
customer_reviews.author: holla

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, scratchy fabric.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see it fits well and looks good, nice and modest. The control is okay. Work on its own there is still waiting movement but your not gonna get hit in the face or that hard drop. So it reduced movement but not eliminated. The fabric is kinda scratchy on the straps and band. The fabric over the breasts is comfortable and not scratchy. It's pretty breathable. I'm hoping the the scratchy fabric softens with washes. I got a 44c cup fits great but I think I may be a 42 since kissing some weight. So I'm not 100% sure if the band was bigger than expected or if I'm smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great support, not much adjustability
customer_reviews.text: Finally a comfortable sports bra with solid support for my well endowed chest. The only complaint I have is that I wish there was more adjustability to the straps. My torso is on the short side, so I need shorter straps. This is a common problem for me with comfort strap bras and I will have to sew them myself to get it to fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Start out great, but don't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bra 4 months ago. At first it was great. They really do prevent bouncing and are comfortable. However, 4 months in and this bra has started to rub when I'm working out. It's rubbing my skin off underneath my left breast, and rubbing the skin off under my right side bra strap. Sadly either I'm going to have to wear a sports bra under this bra to prevent the rubbing, or I'm going to have to throw it away. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W.

customer_reviews.title: Its super disappointing — the bra looks AMAZING on
customer_reviews.text: This product was manufactured wrong! One of the straps is sewn on twisted, and they are not detachable so you cant un-twist it. Video shows what i mean. Its super disappointing — the bra looks AMAZING on. It is incredibly minimizing and gives a perfect shape. It sucks that it was made with this mistake!
customer_reviews.author: SS/IJW

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4", weigh about 175lbs, and I normally wear a 36/38 DDD in my regular bras. I ordered this in size 36F and I'm very pleased with the fit. For me it offers medium support. I do still get some bounce when running or jumping, but for low impact activities it works well. I've already ordered more, and I'd recommend this bra to others.
customer_reviews.author: jhoustee

customer_reviews.title: I Didn't Love It
customer_reviews.text: The struggle is real when trying to find a full figure sports bra. I wear a 40DDD in Victoria's Secret bras. Based on the reviews, I went with a 42F in this bra, and the fit worked. What I didn't like: 1) No padding. 2) It is not soft, and feels very itchy! 3) It feels cheap. I stopped trying to make it work after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah615

customer_reviews.title: See Through - ZERO MODESTY
customer_reviews.text: I wore this sport bra to the gym once under a work out tank top. I felt like you could see vividly every aspect of my breasts and nipples. NOT COOL. This bra is inexpensive and is made out of low cost material. If you wear it under a thick cotton t-shirt it shouldn't be a problem, but most work-out heart is thin and this bra is absolutely not appropriate. Besides the modesty - since the construction of the bra is made from thin material my breasts also moved around a ton while working out - so it doesn't work for actual exercise.
customer_reviews.author: GoodTimes949

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sports bra with great support
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1 148lbs and typically wear DDD in Victoria Secret bras. I bought a DD and it fit fine. I also was worried about not having underwire but there was no difference. I even would wear this as an everyday bra. It closes in the back and doesn't need to go over your head. No uniboob and the one piece of fabric hides cleavage. Perfect for bending over in classes or gym. Only negative is the bra is not sexy....kinda looks a granny bra in the beige color. My guy said it a retro kind of sexy.
customer_reviews.author: What?

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports bra!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a real review. I wasn't given any discount or anything to leave a review. I have been searching for a sports bra that works. This one does what it says. I am a 36 D and I workout with a personal trainer. I do HIIT workouts, stregthened training and running. With this bra there is very little bounce. It also is very breathable. It fits snug but I like that. It runs true to size. It even feels like it supports my back and shoulders. I am definitely buying more of these. I highly recommend this bra especially for women's who are larger. Seriously the best support I have ever had in a sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pelton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit exactly the size I needed it holes everything in place, breast doesn't bounce rays in place, love the fabric really conftarble
customer_reviews.author: Patricia cueto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Now yes it's my fault the waist line didn't fit I should have ordered a size up. However 8 had spare bra extensions for that so it makes no difference for my personal review. Now on to the honesty... Pure ugly honesty. I'm an heavy woman over 300lbs and starting to workout thank God. And this sports bra keeps my girls from bouncing everywhere, it's comfortable and great for sweating too. Hand wash these though do not use in washer. I have seen my self sweat a storm and this thing barely was wet. LOVE IT. Will buy more just a bigger waist it does run small.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sports bra that truly supports full figured women
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in black. This bra is amazing . It offers full coverage for the girls. Let me give you some specifics . I wear a size 46i and this fully covers and gives me a nice sleek look when I’m working out. You won’t be disappointed with this sports bra. It’s a must buy!’
customer_reviews.author: DiamondsForever

customer_reviews.title: I was reluctant... BUT I'M THRILLED
customer_reviews.text: I was so reluctant. I have never had good luck with sports bras, ever. As a 42H/I, they NEVER fit properly, ever, even if they *should*. They sag, they stretch, they bounce, they provide no support. Nothing works. But I saw these had generally positive reviews and despite being reluctant, especially since the price was so low (prices for 42H/I bras are not usually sub $30....) I bought a couple. AND I AM THRILLED! They are SO comfortable, completely breathable, full support, no bounce... I love them! I'm so happy to finally have a sports bra that actually WORKS for my size!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy1355

customer_reviews.title: Fits to size, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I go to a bra fitter once a year so I know my size. This is her favorite athletic bra for larger busts. I have this bra in several colors and also appreciate the modesty neckline, because a well supported larger bust can have very high cleavage which isn't appropriate in all settings. I like that I don't look or feel like I'm going to bounce out of this. I do not like that some of the new colors are coming with banding that has their brand name all along it. I feel like a walking billboard. Hopefully they will stop doing this soon.
customer_reviews.author: never enough books

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bra; cup size too large
customer_reviews.text: I was freaking out: did my boobs shrink overnight? Other bras have me as a 42 C--I ordered that size. The bra easily looks like a 42 D or DD. Otherwise, if you order with that in mind, the bra has that lovely high camisole top. Supportive and not revealing a lot of cleavage? It's ideal and I've been looking for THIS BRA forever... I loved it. I'll try to return it but the seller did not include a return label. I have no printer. I may be up a creek without a paddle. I'll contact the seller and hope they'll let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Great Support!
customer_reviews.text: have rarely been able to speak positively about the fit of a bra! I am 40DDD plus. I wear a 2X or 3X depending on the day... I am high waisted which means low busted (requires the strap to usually be as fully exited as possible). I ordered and received 40G. This fits perfectly! The fabric is firm, breathable. The 4 hooks provide excellent support. I wear this exercising and under clothes and I imagine in the summer, with shorts! Cute and comfortable. Well done, Glamorize! I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: SueZ

customer_reviews.title: Very rough and scratchy even after laundering
customer_reviews.text: It fit well but I can only tolerate wearing for approximately one hour. The threads, and there are lots of them, are rough and scratchy causing a great deal of skin irritation. At first, I thought perhaps it had been stitched with plastic threads but it appears that it’s just very heavy duty thread or perhaps several strands. Of course I washed it first and used fabric softener as well. I just can’t take the irritation. Very disappointed and now I’m out the cost because I have laundered the item. No more Glamorise for me. Sticking with my old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Big Breast Women - GO NO FURTHER - THIS IS THE BEST BRA EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bra ever!!!!! My daughter has had nothing but lousy fitting bras. She has been to many professionals to get the prefect fit and nothing has every worked until now. After reading the reviews and checking out everyone pictures I decided to take a chance and thank goodness I did. The bra held strong with NO spillage anywhere!!! The bra lifted, supported and control my daughter's J breast. I am so happy and will be buying two of every color. Can't wait for them to get the blue one back in stock
customer_reviews.author: AFS

customer_reviews.title: My everyday bra!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a comfortable bra for a while. I’m 5’7, 140 lbs, 36F. I’m thin with large breasts, so it’s difficult to hold them up. It affects my posture. I have fibrocystic breasts, so aside from having the cysts removed there’s nothing I can do about it. I have literally been through all types of bras, shapewear, anything that would help. Nothing really worked or fit right. This bra is amazing! The size fits perfectly. I know this is a sports bra, but I’m going to buy more and this is definitely going to be my everyday bra.
customer_reviews.author: London Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: These are great running bras or high impact exercises. The provide really good support and are pretty comfortable. I gave them a 4/5 rating for comfort because they are a bit stiff and fabric is little rough. But I think they will soften up with wash and wear. They are not the most flattering because there are these seams in the front that show through your top. The bottom line when I am running I am not concerned about looking good only having support which this bra definitely provides. They also provider full coverage. So if you are a bigger chested gal you will appreciate this too :)
customer_reviews.author: Nitzalove

customer_reviews.title: Finally no bouncing for high impact exercise!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Just...oh my goodness... FINALLY!!! I'm a 34H and it's soooo hard to find a bra that will actually hold and support without any bouncing while I'm exercising. I seriously have to later like 3 regular exercising bras (can't breathe...ouch!) and they still bounce. And I mean high impact exercise... Like all sorts of jumping kind of exercise. Puts all my other bras to shame. Also, I'm breastfeeding right now, and so usually it hurts to wear a sports bra, but not this one!! Note: I JUST got this so I haven't had the opportunity to get a feel for the bra long-term, but I was just so excited that I wanted to write a review immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: I like this sport bra - NO WIRE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this second sport bra after the first one experienced the dreaded `bent wire' in the back that hurts and is frustrating when putting on. Alot of bras get that after a while, so no complaint. I like that this covers a bit more of the top, though would like even more coverage so when I am in a down dog in yoga, I prefer the 'girls' be more modest. But this is a great bra, for low or high impact, and no wires, which I am trying to get away from as possible. the Black and Pink works well with just about any gym oufit.
customer_reviews.author: annieb

customer_reviews.title: I own several of these, but this one in particular is a very scratchy material
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Glamorise sports bra's with the built in cami! I own 6 of these! I wish they had more color choices because I own every one of them in this style and LOVE THEM! This one in particular though, is a very scratchy material that irritates my skin. No joke! Wear it for a day and you will literally have red irritated skin where the bra sat......If you have sensitive skin, I'd skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No spandex in this bra!
customer_reviews.text: What the heck! I put this on and thought, “who the heck is giving this thing 5 stars!?” It’s so course to touch. It has a seam that runs right across the nibblets . It feels like some kind of bullet proof vest material with no stretch at all. I hate it. I ran in it twice and yes it holds my breasts, but it just feels so gross on my skin. Like I’m wearing some kind of unbreathable tarp. I’m writing this review wondering if I can still return it. Honestly don’t buy this. I just had a baby and need something for my massive boobs. I’m like a 36 DDD or bigger in the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Nikolaev

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy this bra. Saw all the reviews and thought it was going to work out. I struggle to find a good fitting bra due to the fact that my size is very large. Unfortunately, this bra was very uncomfortable. It felt like my circulation was being cut off. It was painful to just try on. I never actually wore it for a long period of time. Now I have to throw it out. If you have a large chest ( I am a 42F or sometimes 42G) I would recommend something else. This has NO support whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: MsAngel88

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my 48DD girls steady without feeling as if they're being bound down!
customer_reviews.text: As a large woman, I have had a difficult time finding support which is also comfortable. Another online retailer had a bargain price on this model of bra last summer, so I took a chance and ordered one, thinking that it wasn't a lot to waste if it didn't meet my needs...fortunately, it was not a waste. I like the way it fits and supports so much I ordered two more – they're sturdy, attractive and comfortable, a bargain at twice the price. If they had my size in more colors, my entire wardrobe would start with these!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was glad for the review which recommended we go 'larger' on cup. Even with that proviso, I felt 'squished'. I noticed the band was shorter than my usual size 38. I suspect that if I lost ten or fifteen pounds, the thing would be comfortable. I won't buy any more of this model. I'm staying with the good fit I get with the Glamorise "Magic Lift" Medium Impact bra, (no squish, no 'uni-boob') and with the Glamorise "Magic Lift" Front Close Posture bra. (The whole thing was an experiment, as I noted this style comes in smaller band sizes, thinking ahead to possible weight loss. If that happens, the Posture bra has a 36 band.)
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Lansberry

customer_reviews.title: Everything's in place
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sports bra. It minimizes, holds everything in place with very little bounce. It's also very affordable for a plus-size sports bra. There's still something of a uniboob appearance, but not like another I own that cost quite a bit more. I especially like the netting sewn across the front for ventilation. I have found this particular bra very comfortable for those days when PMS has me sore and achy. I get the support I need without feeling bound up and it actually relieves some of the pain. I'll be purchasing again. UPDATE: I also purchased the purple one. The color is fantastic and looks much better than the photo!
customer_reviews.author: 2bliss

customer_reviews.title: At last...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first EVER bra I have owned that manages to tame my breasts without hurting my shoulders or my back. When the shoulders start to feel too tight I can slide the strap over just a bit with good relief. These do not ride up my back like every other bra I have ever worn saving me from a really sore back at the end of a day of working as a registered nurse. I started with two, now have four and they are my go-to for all but dressing up.
customer_reviews.author: byounng

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting
customer_reviews.text: I am now a Glamorise lover and have totally switched over to this brand. This particular style is my casual at home wear and for working outside or walking. Great support and fit. It doesn't pinch anywhere and the back strap is wide enough it doesn't create any unsightly bulging for me. I am 5'6 and weigh 135 and wear a 36C. It has good support inside the cups and they way it is sewn creates lift and definition so your clothes fit better. I no longer feel "blobby" on top nor do I feel like I'm going to fall out of these like others that don't give enough coverage. I highly recommend any style in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: YellowRoseTXTop Contributor: Fragrance

customer_reviews.title: DD Isn’t the Only Large Bust Size!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I initially gave this bra 5 stars, but I have reduced it to 4 stars because the band rolls up in the front and sides instead of staying flat. When it rolls up, it puts extra pressure on the ribcage area, which can feel uncomfortable. Other than that, this is a great bra!! Many thanks to this brand for catering to women with large cup sizes!!! Large cup sizes do not only stop at DD. It is very rare to find cup sizes in G, H, I, and up. This bra bits extremely comfortably!! Very minimal bounce, and no spillage from the top or the sides! I will definitely be ordering more! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grrwl4me

customer_reviews.title: The girls ain't going nowhere
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2 180 with a 38G normally. I went with 36H on this because I want this band tight since I've noticed my bras getting looser. It fits perfect on the tightest snaps so maybe go down a size if you want the girls locked up like alcatraz. It doesn't smoosh them like pancakes either and it's pretty comfy. I haven't knocked myself out yet while running so I consider that a job well done.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you cant find your size in stores.
customer_reviews.text: Fit: Accurate to measurements. Comfort: meh. I wouldn't call it comfortable but it's not irritating. Style: Hideous, let's be honest. I bought white and it looks like a medical bra. Function: True to description. It is medium support. This is not for running, but it does work for low-moderate intensity workouts. Recommendation: only purchase this if it is your sole option below $70. If you are a size that any other brand carries, get that brand. If you're looking for an economic sports bra in an abnormal size, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum99

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY I found a great exercise bra that's supportive & did not break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Thank-you, thank-you, Glamorise! I have been on a very long quest to find a bra I can use for work-outs that hold my girls in place. One that I can put on without asphyxiating, & get out of without contorting into uncomfortable positions! My girls have created uncomfortable work-outs for many, many years. I often wore 2 bras to keep them in place if I knew I was going to have an intense work-out. This bra is great! I just ordered another. I paid full price & have no incentives other than a desire to share info with other well-endowed women.
customer_reviews.author: jb, NP

customer_reviews.title: This bra fits does what it claims, it holds and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bra! It fits and holds my breasts in such a way that I don't feel them hardly move and it is comfortable. I had surgery and my doc sent me home wearing a super snug binder that dug into my armpits. She recommended getting a sports bra with a front closure. I tried another brand designed for recovery but it did not offer enough compression to make me feel it would aid in my recovery. I wish this company made a no-bounce bra with a front hook and eye closure. It may not be pretty, but fit, support and comfort are more important--I'm ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: Air Travel Bra
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bra specifically for a trip so I don't set off the metal detector in the TSA while wearing my underwire bra. I tried it on for fit and it's true to my 38DD size. It took some time to get used to it, but it felt fairly comfortable and it does seem to support well for a soft cup bra. The only thing I don't care for is the fabric which is rough. I'm hoping it will soften up with some washings, but I believe that it will serve its purpose for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kreutzer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: The fabric and design of this bra is ok, and I really wanted to like it, but the cups make your boobs look really weird and pointy and there's no padding in the cups. Also, in general, this bra does not have much more support than the average sports bra, which defeats the purpose. Top-heavy women are looking for a bra that minimizes bounce....this one does not. No matter how you adjust the straps, it doesn't help. The area to adjust the bra straps is rather short, not giving much ability to make the straps shorter and provide support. I can say, it looks nice, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amaryllis

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but trim is scratchy
customer_reviews.text: This fits great and does what all the reviews say, however the trim is **scratchy**. I've no idea why they would trim an undergarment with scratchy trim. I got the grey with the camo-like pink trim. Having said that it doesn't bother me when I wear it just when I first put it on. Unfortunately the cup lines across the bust will show under clingy workout wear however so I plan to wear it with mostly black or patterned tops. I guess that's the trade-off for a sports bra that will really do what it supposed to do for larger busts. Also, does cause uni-boob effect.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt at buying this bra. I normally wear a 40g. That's what I bought the first time and it was a bit snug so I gave it to my daughter. Tried again with this one and bought a 42g. I couldn't even get this one fastened. What the heck? I just wanted a supportive sprots bra. At this point I give up and will just suffer with underwire bras. Very disappointed. And when I put in for a return I'm informed that they'll charge a fee. Seriously!? Complete waste of money either way.
customer_reviews.author: terrilynn

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: If you were on the fence about purchasing this product, stop wondering and just do it. I could not be more pleased with the fit and support. The description says no bounce and it means it. I have recently developed quite a love for running, however, my 36F breasts were really making it uncomfortable, I kept looking at high support sport bras and after purchasing what seems like hundreds, finding nothing that I loved (more so tolerated because it was the best I could find/afford) I came across this one and was instantly happy! I started with purchasing just one and did (2) 5k's and knew that I needed more because I was over the moon!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's made well and looks like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It's made well and looks like the picture, but unless you wear only tee shirts or other high necked tops you wont like it. It shows in almost everyrhing as the cami is very high up on your chest and non removable. The bra was also wat too hard to put on for someone with bad shoulders. Normally i would turn it upside down and twist it around after fastening, but its so long with so much sticky rubber that the bra would twist without a fight. Its also pretty long and rolls up. It needs a removable cami, a shorter length and definitely a front closure. I sent back dor a refund.
customer_reviews.author: karen williams

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: First of all, do NOT get the one with pink camo. I bought it in a variety of sizes and colors and I agree with all the other reviews. I don't know what that fabric of made of but it could be weaponized. As for the bra itself, it's fine, but I never wear it. It's not supportive enough to feel like wearing on its own for workouts, but its not comfortable enough to wear outside of it. There are other sports bras for big sizes I just like a lot better. My very busty sisters may also like to look elsewhere, but it would likely be fine for those under an I size.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable high impact bra for ample bosoms
customer_reviews.text: 36F here. This is a solid sports bra at a great price. There's a little room to spare in the cup, but this doesn't cause significant bounce. I use this bra running and it's great. I've only had it for a month, so I can't speak to its long term durability, but I've taken it on ~10 runs so far and seen no significant change in the bra. My only complaint is that the bra goes so high up the chest that few of my running shirts have a neckline high enough to cover it. Very minor wardrobe woe that will inevitably lead to me buying a few new shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy unlined abomination
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst bra I've ever bought. The fabric is scratchy, with no lining, the seams of the itchy fabric are lying right across your areolas, it's awful. Although some of the bounce is reduced, for the tight structures of this prison, there should be no bounce at all, and that is simply not the case. The "cups" (there is no cup) also are misshapen in a way that reminisces the high structured scratchy nylon cone tit bras my grandmother brought with her out of the sixties. Literally, awful, so disappointed, I'll stick to double sports bras thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Weird folds and Horrible fit.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! What can I say. It’s horrible looking and not comfortable. I’m older and need to lose weight, but these make me look like I grew a ball on the side of my arm with the way it’s cut. I have a glamorise bra, but this one is horrible. I usually wear a 38DDD (38F) in both Lane Bryant and Glamorise bras and I’ve also been able to wear 36 G, because that’s my measurement. My doctor says that breast tissue is broken down faster with wearing underwire, so here I am. What the heck is with this fold under my breast? This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best fitting bras I’ve ever ordered online. It fits perfectly. It does come up pretty high on my chest, though, which limits the shirts I can wear to T-shirts and it’s kind of odd not having any underwires for this material, which is thick, but not exactly uncomfortable. I have large breasts and a small rib cage, so it’s almost impossible to ever order bras online with my measurements. I’m impressed this one fit so well. I would definitely recommend this bra to any larger busted women.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Twitchell

customer_reviews.title: Glamorise Women's Full Figure Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, took my measurements again, and chose 2 cup sizes up from what I should be. It's still too tight. I'm hoping that it gets a little less stiff after a few washes like other reviews say. Then it would probably fit fine. **Edit 3/2020, it's been a while and it's still really stiff unfortunately.** Even with that, I give it 4 stars because nothing is going ANYWHERE in this bra. So, assuming you can find the right size, this is definitely the sports bra to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Greatbanks

customer_reviews.title: My first Glamorise...not my last
customer_reviews.text: It washes well. It fits like a bra and is not a tight uniboob bra. I love the wide straps they are great as I'm hoisting around a set of 36 DD. The bra is designed to help hide Back fat...which I hate. The extra high cleavage is marvelous... I 've worn Champions before but this was the perfect switch... I ordered the blue and it's bright, rich and blue .. There is a small roll but it's because I'm presently overweight... The design, the fabric and stitching are first rate... Did I mention....most 's the time I wear sports bras ...so it's important It feels perfect....which it does.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Moss

customer_reviews.title: Not a good sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Not at all the quality and attention to detail I expected. It's feels less like a sports bra and more like your mom's old school brasier. There is no padding; there are open seames on the inside right across nipple area. They are really uncomfortable, rub against the skin and leave marks. The bra doesn't stay in place well at all. It scootes up and rolls up under the boobs. The material is stiff and uncomfortable. It's a medium support at best for D cup; by no means 'no bounce'. Based on the design and quality it should not cost more than $15.00
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Fits and supports
customer_reviews.text: So this fits, which is great, as I need a 42J. It does kind of give you the uniboob, and a bit of sweaty boob, and the seam where the mesh connects shows through your shirt if it’s under a T-shirt etc. it is comfortable for the most part, and provides enough support that I can leave the house in it, go for a walk etc. I have not done anything strenuous, and feel like I would still need to wear two bras if I were doing something like running. Which I try not to do anyway so maybe it doesn’t matter🤣.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about bras (especially sports bras) since I am busty. This bra provided support, it covered all the places for me and it is comfortable providing support without binding me too tight. As for sizing I bought the 44 G. It is accurate to size but if you need more cup room consider this rule. If the band size is larger around you can get away with a smaller cup size. It also depends on your problem spots with bras. If you have spill over with back fat go with a larger band around if your breasts are spilling over the top or are exposed under the reinforcement band, go with a larger cup size.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Meh!! So so!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is just okay. Full coverage. Firm support. But I still bounce with heavy exercise. As other reviewers have said the edging material is scratchy and doesn't stretch. The seams in the bra cups show through your t-shirts. The insert in the front at the neckline is weird. It is high necked and doesn't seem necessary. The bra is comfortable in the back . I'm not returning it however I'm also not buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine21

customer_reviews.title: This is the most uncomfortable bra I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: At my size it's hard to find bras. I've been wearing Glamorise bras for years and been happy with all of them. This one is different. I ordered the same correctly fitting size I wear in all the other styles I own and it fits like a much, much smaller bra. I have trouble believing that it is the the size it's labeled as. I wasn't even able to get it on without assistance. Once it was on I wanted it off immediately. Not only is the band is incredibly tight, the fabric is stiff and scratchy. I will be returning this and purchasing another style that does not feel like a torture device.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Finally....support for large bust size!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely thrilled with this sports bra! I do kickboxing workouts and was having trouble finding a sports bra for large bust size that actually holds the girls in place during high impact exercise! I now have 3 of these and they will be my go to from now on. I am a 38-40 DDD and I have both sizes. The 40 gives me just a little more room in the side boob area. So far they are holding up well. I wear and wash each one at least once a week and see no issues. The White is starting to discolor, but that is to be expected....white+sweat=dingy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & supportive
customer_reviews.text: Update June 2020: Somebody mentioned if you get uni-b**b, you need to go up in cup size, which makes perfect sense! Duh TnT lol. I am planning on ordering another one of these bras in a bigger cup size because this is a very NICE sports bra! Very supportive & comfortable, plus good quality materials (I presume. I don't wear it often). ********* Okay so I'm short & fat, but I did not expect uni-b**b based on the pictures. The bra itself is comfortable except for that part! Obviously I don't wear it often.
customer_reviews.author: TnT

customer_reviews.title: Pointy Torture device with no support
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a good sports bra. Words cannot describe how much I regret purchasing this. The encapsulation reminds me of my grandmothers bras, and make your boobs like like cones. If it offered any support, I could work with it, but sadly, it does not. The material is also so uncomfortable. Steer clear. I thought I found an alternative for the Panache, but sadly, there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bambino

customer_reviews.title: Woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: Large chested women who don’t want to be knocked out by your own boobs while you are working out this is the holy grail! I have tried so many sports bras but when I jump rope or Zumba I feel like I have to dodge my boobs no matter how supportive each bra claims to be. This was a dream come true (only my husband was disappointed at the lack of bouncing). I’m a short 34ddd so a lot of times the straps are so long I could put them over my head on the opposite side but this bra adjusted to perfection! BUY THIS BRA
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy any other sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this sports bra since 2013. Needless to say, I LOVE them! I work busy shifts in a big city hospital and often had to climb multiple flights of stairs for an emergency. Before these bras, these 38 DD girls would be going every which way, but since, nope - they stay right where I put them. I get no should "rug" burn, and the back strap stays in place. It doesn't create any unnecessary bulges, and it actually seems to minimize my bust. From the gym to the supermarket, these won't let you down. I'll buy these as long as they're available!
customer_reviews.author: Ja DASH Nell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Best sports bra I’ve ever owned. I was prepared to drop a good $75 on a high impact sports bra, but decided to check amazon first I case I found something else. It’s difficult to find a 34H bra in typical stores let alone a sports bra that actually works. Decided to give this one a try and I’m so glad I did! Barely a bounce even when jumping rope. I’m very self conscious about working out typically because of the motion I experience with regular sports bras. I can run again!! Bought in two colors and will honestly probably get even more. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - good support (using for burpees, jump squats) - easy to put on - don't feel constricted wearing it - adjustable straps - wide bands Cons: - abrasive edging - not really sure if this is a con, but if you're going to wear a shirt over this bra or might look a little odd due to the seams I would rate 5 stars if not for the edging. Pulling a strap on and off a couple of times when I was first adjusting the length was enough to irritate my skin. Fortunately once it's on and mostly not moving around it isn't bad for me. I could see it being better or worse for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Sloth Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Yoga Inversions Without Wardrobe Malfunctions!!
customer_reviews.text: A bra that fits my tiny band size and giant sacks of fat? One that will hold me in during inversions at yoga, unlike the VS one that allowed a severe case of accidental nudity? One that doesn't poke me in odd places, require a zipper, and or cost a fortune (in comparison)? One with straps actually wide enough to hold the girls up without pinching? Sign me up! The minute I got home from my first yoga class in this bra, I came to Amazon to order another. I'm writing this first, because it's that awesome. I have new-ish bras from VS, Brooks, and Curvy Kate. None fit as well or provide as much real support as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Short

customer_reviews.title: True to size, great support
customer_reviews.text: The best sports bra i have. Out of 15 sport bras i have , all in range from $20 to $70, this one my favorite now. Well constructed, light weight, true to size bra gives me a confidence, control and good shape. I usually wear 36F, but because of wide side support, ordered 38F. It fits good on the first raw of hooks, which doesn’t leave me an option in case i loose some weight, so my next bra will be back to my 36. The best part is a front mesh and for F ladies like me, who do yoga is a MUST.
customer_reviews.author: Rgal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I'm over the moon that I've found this sports bra! Seriously! It's been a real struggle over the years. I'm 5'4, 180 lbs, and typically wear a 40 C/D. I originally purchased this bra in the 40D, but exchanged it for the 42D (40D was a bit tight around my rib cage) and it's a much more comfortable fit without sacrificing support. The support that these bras provide are wonderful and there is hardly any bounce, yet very comfortable to breathe---I don't feel like my boobs are pressed against my chest super hard. Comfortable enough to wear all day. Hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: enzy

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a size 36E or higher, read this!
customer_reviews.text: LADIES here is your perfect sports bra! I’m a 36 E and for my entire life I have searched the web and in stores for a sports bra that makes me feel like my boobs aren’t trying to slingshot from my chest when I run. I’ve tried the most expensive bras and still had a uniboob AND they still threatened to hit my face while taking a step class. Lo and behold, by the grace of the bra gods, I somehow came across this wonder. It fits TTS and holds. you. in. place. Yes, you heard right. As soon as I tried it on I ordered a second. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: SC0523

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I put this on, ran around the house, then ran to my phone to order more. Wow. This is the real deal. Disclosure....I am not really familiar with higher end sports bras, I normally just wing it at Marshalls or wherever. I am 5'2, 148 lbs and a 38 DD. I found this completely true to size. I was convinced I would be sending it back because it didn't fit. I run every day, which is the only time I wear a sports bra and my boobs are always all over the place. This one ladies, is a winner:) Update 3 months later.....I now own 3 ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tara A.

customer_reviews.title: Solid high impact bra for larger busts
customer_reviews.text: As a 38D and a runner I have some trouble finding bras that do the trick but this one is pretty solid. Not too much bounce on this one and it kept everything up where it should be. I did 3 miles on a warm day and there was no chafing. I haven’t tried it out for a longer distance yet but I didn’t find the fabric to be scratchy or chafe at all. Very solid high impact bra that works well for a big bust and a decent price. I’d get this again. I usually wear a 38D and that fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Caffeinatedkate

customer_reviews.title: A great bra for the value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra about 5 months ago in a size 36g and the plain beige color. I was worried because some of the reviews claimed that it may rub or cause discomfort, but I have had zero issues with this. When I run, it keeps everything well supported despite having no under wire. With that too, it's not like other cheap sports bras that stretch out and no longer provide any support. As I said, I've had this bra for 5 months and it still works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shop1423

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Thought Out Design
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it did not fit as tight as some of the more popular sports bras. But in the end, that’s what I love about it! And works fine 👍 holds the girls up ;) And I love how the neck line comes up high enough so I can do any workout I like without worrying the world will see my cleavage. You need that especially when you have been blessed with larger sizes. So I can go running outside and stretch at the park, and be non-the-wiser. Yay! Oh and I like the neon bit of this bra, it’s unexpectedly fashionably flattering. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 36G. The straps on this bra are wide enough that they don't dig in causing neck and shoulder pain; but still get decent lift of heavy breasts. I'm a nurse, and this bra is comfortable for the span of my 12 hr shift. Can't wear anything v-neck (if you don't want the top piece will show). It shows some lines under your shirt as well. I'll usually wear it with a snug tank under my uniform and that helps hide the lines. Overall, I like this bra and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Best sports bra for a large bust
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Glamorise bra I’ve bought. It’s light weight, doesn’t pinch, has soft supportive straps, and holds everything in! I am quite busty and it’s always been difficult to find a supportive sports bra, that also doesn’t create a uniboob or show half your cleavage.. this bra covers it all! The extra little fabric above the bust is so perfect to hide the cleavage, and it surprisingly is incredibly supportive for such a light weight bra. I may be buying a third.. highly recommend!! And PS I am a runner/jogger and I get very little bounce
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Supportive, Good Bounce Control!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra in a white size 40DD and it fits really well. The cups fit me perfectly and the band and straps are comfortable. Personally, this is the most comfortable and supportive sports bra I’ve ever had which feels like such a win. Plus it’s not itchy/scratchy material! Since it arrived, I’ve worn it twice for personal training and once on a walk/jog and I’m happy to report that this has good bounce control. Feel like I’m going to be ordering more of these in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Autu5300

customer_reviews.title: Bra for work
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a bra big enough to fit me comfortably but also compress my chest a little bit. I work in a vets office, so I wanted something to push the girls down a little so my scrub tops would fit more comfortable in the top. It works! It has good support and strong straps. The only thing is mine has a tendency to curl at the waistband under the breasts, but that is my only chief complaint. Wish it was a little cheaper though. And as expected, this is very much a grandma bra haha
customer_reviews.author: Sheri L. McLennan

customer_reviews.title: Front looks cute, but definitely not my fav!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: has some padding in the shoulder straps that make it nice for us bigger chested girls when doing a hard work out, front looks very flattering and cute, and I don’t bounce around and has good support! Cons: the material is a little hard and scratchy, where the front looks cute the back looks like a regular bra and isn’t as nice, the is no stretch what so ever, is a bit see though and there are no padding in the cups (I got the white one so when you sweat during a work out is gets pretty see though don’t wear without a top over it)
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: My new fav
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite bra. I’ve ordered several more lol. I personally found that it fit better when I went down a cup size. I did keep the band size my regular. Super comfortable. Does occasionally annoy me by coming under my armpits, but I love these bras.
customer_reviews.author: Veritas M

customer_reviews.title: Always give a sports bra a chance
customer_reviews.text: Well made bra, first time l have purchased a sports bra with this style. First few times when you wear the bra it's newness is evident, sometimes closing the bra at the back takes a bit of time, but with every new bra you have get use to it. I wore this sports bra a few times, each time it became easier to wear, liked the style, that added support, the bra washer well, l washed in 30deg, came out really well. I have now ordered a second. Color was as expected. Just keep in mind sports bras are firm, check your size and give your bra a chance when putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Gerie

customer_reviews.title: I’m definitely buying more!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what the reviewer meant by the trim being painful. I personally didn’t experience that at all. For years I’ve worn sports bras constantly and this feels great. I like that it doesn’t have a racer back to dig into my upper back muscles. It sits wide on my shoulders and my posture feels better. I also like that it’s not padded. Just good support and lift with plenty of ways to adjust the fit. I think it’s well thought out and a great sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found A Sports Bra That Fits
customer_reviews.text: When you are top heavy, finding a sports bra in any store is like finding a needle in a haystack. I was so glad to find this bra on here. I was hesitant about the fit. However, it fits wonderfully, and I can feel comfortable in my workouts. I will purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireBaire

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I hope this turns out to be durable and last a long time. It supports me well and is so comfortable. I hope it holds up because I ordered several more. The price was good except that when I waited to order more on the amazon prime day the bra was two dollars more than the week before. Is that how Amazon cheats their customers out of getting real breaks on prices? I really should have given it 4 stars but I do like the bra.
customer_reviews.author: maree

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect for developed teen!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter saw this bra tested on Good Mythical Morning with Rhett & Link (YouTube show). We had a good laugh but were honestly curious about the Glamorize, as she'd been experiencing back, shoulder and neck pain from D-cup breasts, especially during PE. This 36D bra fits perfectly and puts no pressure on any one spot. The front and shoulder straps resemble a tank top, quite modest, meeting the school dress code easily. The back is extremely supportive and even encourages proper posture. Highly recommended! I'll be buying more, and some for myself, as soon as I'm able.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for high impact
customer_reviews.text: First sports bra I've owned and I don't jiggle. I'm a double d cup and wear this bra 3 days a week for bootcamp. Holds in place and I will be purchasing again. As the other reviewers said, it is slightly itchy, but after a couple washes it is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jobson

customer_reviews.title: Holly Tits
customer_reviews.text: Holly Bit**Tits.... i have and i mean i have never been able to find a spots bra that fits since high school. Im a size J for Jawblishes but truth be told the struggle is real. Thank you a hundred time over, i would pay tit loads for these. Tee hee lol
customer_reviews.author: PointBlank

customer_reviews.title: Great for $25
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 36DDD so you can imagine how hard it is to find a good supportive high-intensity sports bra for less than $40-$70. I have a smaller frame so buying an XL/XXL bra never fits my back and is loose but a large suffocates the girls to death lol. I found this bra to be very ugly but supportive while doing my HIIT workout. I wore it for a day as a regular bra because it helped my posture during my workout but long-time wear hurt. I recommend wearing it for a workout and taking it off immediately after. For $25 I am happy. Will most likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tomeka Seigler

customer_reviews.title: RUN MUCH SMALLER AROUND THAN IT SHOULD
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size of bra I normally wear and it was at least 8" short in the back and the bra cups were too small. Needed to return it and couldn't find where to print the label so now I have two of the stinking things that I don't even want. Maybe I should return the other one with a bigger cup just to recoup a third of what I have invested in these stupid things. I will need to have a special bra extended made to wear it! Also, to me, it is very scratchy fabric. That can add to my cost. I'm a very unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Winton

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package this sports bra looks like it won’t be very supportive but IT IS! I was pleasantly surprised by this bra. I HIIT train daily, some days I train harder than others. This is the first sports bra Ive found that supports but is also comfy! I have less bounce with this one than my enell.
customer_reviews.author: Goddes5482

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I found a sports bra that fits! I’m well endowed and can’t find a sports bra to save my life till I found this. I love the cleavage cover. I’m not popping out. If you have sensitive skin I believe the reviews that are not happy about the trim. It can get itchy but doesn’t bother me much. I can live with a slight itch every so often for a sports bra that actually fits me! I wouldn’t necessarily run with it but it definitely works with yoga, elliptical and other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Different... but give it a chance
customer_reviews.text: I’m so excited about this bra! The material is not as bouncy or soft as a expected, but I think that makes it better. I have never had a sport bra that has fit SO well and kept my chest in place - I wear a 36DDD and I ordered a large, it is perfect with room to tighten the band if needed. I have not ran in the bra yet, but hopeful! I am also ecstatic because this bra does not give my boobs the typical “uni boob” look that all other sports bras do, today I’m wearing it to work under a sweater and no one can tell the difference!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Compression and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: After surgery, I needed a bra that would compress the girls, and still be comfortable 24 hours a day. This bra really worked for me. I even bought several more. Even though I could probably stop wearing them now, I like wearing them for the support. I have fewer back problems with them. I tried a bunch of different bras in my search for something comfortable after my surgery and this one helped stave off my pain the best with it's overall compression.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover for Life

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for hard labor job
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten two sizes knowing a lot of online cloths never fit right. This was the size above my normal size and it hurts my ribs to wear it after a couple of hours. I wish I never wasted the money. I am half way through work and I can’t wait til I can take the freaking thing off. The bottom rolls up constantly, the straps are itchy despite having been washed twice. At this rate by the end of the day I will want to burn this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Not for Larger Cup Sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to having a comfortable bra, but it did not come close to fitting within the cups. This bra offered no support, even when standing still to try it on. It was like one of those loose spandex camisoles with the built-in shelf bra without any support at all. I definitely would not recommend this bra to anybody who's in the larger cup sizes.. I had been traveling, so I missed the return window by a day.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Price

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps the girls from bouncing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two different sizes of these bras due to my recent loss of 25 lbs. The original larger size, even throughout my shrinkage, still kept my girls stable even though there was extra room in the cups. I was able to use them longer because of the adjustable band as well as the adjustable straps. The smaller size fits just as great as the larger ones did at first. What I LOVE about these bras the most, though, is that these are a breeze to wear. I have bad shoulders, and it hurts to struggle into pullover sport bras. Additionally, I appreciate the non-cleavage showing aspect. A friend recommended these to me, and I'm glad she did!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S. Hjermstad

customer_reviews.title: Frumpy boobs
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 36DD, my normal bra size. The band fit well but YIKES the cups were super baggy. The bra doesn't have pads, but it structured in hopes to separate your breasts. I did like that the bra is high cut to help with any boob jiggles, but unfortunately for me it just made me look like I was wearing a bag over my girls. I couldn't see how even a significantly smaller cup size would make this bra fit well, so I ended up returning.
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fit
customer_reviews.text: As a large bosom woman, finding the right fit sport bra is are. But Glamorise Women's Full Figure No Bounce Plus Size Camisole Wirefree Back Close Sports Bra got it right. This bra fits me perfectly and it magically minimalize me as well. I actually look better in my clothes when I wear this bra. However, the "no bounce" claim is a bit of an exaggeration. My girls bounced while wearing it. Not as much. But they did bounce. Still bra is better than any other sports bra I have tried. I can't wait to go jogging in it. I would highly recommend it to other full figure ladies. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: luvlife347

customer_reviews.title: No breast pain and wire digging in
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God!! I bought this bra and it is a perfect fit. I am a size 38 DD. I Am 5 feet 2. This bra is so comfortable. I have it on now as I am writing this. I will be ordering another one. There is no movement or juggling. This bra is very comfortable, I can wear this all day. I recently had trouble with a lot of breast pain, but this bra is wonderful it gives me the support that I need and I have no pain thank you for making such a wonderful bra.
customer_reviews.author: Queentasingtao

customer_reviews.title: Theme song should be “CONTROL” by Janet Jackson!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! I got so tired of these “sports bras” and my jiggly puffs were not being kept on a leash! I put this on and went to my physical conditioning class and my jiggly puffs remained on lock down! It was very comfortable. Fot great, and again, the main thing...kept the puppies on a leash! I’m happy I came across these, now I can workout without coming out looking like I attended a boxing class!
customer_reviews.author: La' Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sport bra. Being large chested I feel like my clevage is always hanging out so I liked how it has the extra coverage over that area. That's the main reason why I purchased it. The materal is soft, I like that it's not a razor back and doesn't hurt my shoulders. My ONLY complaint is that I wish it was a little more restrictive. It has good support for being wireless but the "girls" so move around a lot when jogging or doing jumping jacks etc..that some of my other sports bra are better at. I still like the coverage and fit on this one, the price is great and would buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M

customer_reviews.title: Great for running and cycling
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this bra for yoga, cycling, and running. For the price, this garment is surprisingly supportive. You wouldn't want to wear it all day long, but for a 30-60 minute workout, it's perfect. Hand washing is easy, and the material dries quickly enough to be worn and washed daily. Support garments geared towards women with larger breasts are hard to find in stores at a fair price, but this bra fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: david nespoli

product_meta.title: Glamorise Women's Full Figure No Bounce Plus Size Camisole Wirefree Back Close Sports Bra #1066
product_meta.description: For fuller busted women seeking upper bust control, full coverage, and medium impact support. Minimize bounce with full coverage, seamed cups
feature_bullets: BOUNCE CONTROL - Lightweight mesh camisole front panel provides cooling ventilation and secure upper bust containment, so you can jump, cycle, yoga, stretch, run and workout with confidence.
HIGH PERFORMANCE - Quick dry, breathable material, wicks sweat and moisture. Reinforced wirefree cups delivers flattering lift and impact support.

MAXIMUM COMFORT - Two way back stretch allows for free range of movement while securely holding your bra in place. Extra plush adjustable hook and eye closure protects your back. Wide, adjustable, padded straps help relieve shoulder pressure and back pain.

DESIGNED IN NEW YORK SINCE 1921 - We have 100 years of experience thoughtfully crafting bras for full figured, plus size women. Our goal is to make your favorite bra - the one you can trust to wear all day long.
